EmailTemplate.name: WEX Holiday e-Card 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Season's Greetings and Happy Holidays.
Thanks for making this year so special.
Here's a little special e-greeting from all of us at WEX!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vvdx7coyqs4&feature=youtu.be
Warm Regards,
{!User.Name}, {!User.Title} | WEX Inc. {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
